name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a Senior Frontend Engineer, I bring 8 years of experience specializing in **React Native**, **TypeScript**, and **Tailwind**. My expertise in developing high-performance user interfaces aligns with the demands of fintech solutions, utilizing tools like **Expo** for rapid application development. I leverage strong skills in automation and testing frameworks such as **Cypress** to ensure quality and performance excellence.

In addition to my frontend capabilities, I have a solid background in full-stack development, harnessing **React**, **Next.js**, and **Node.js**. My knowledge of cloud services on **Azure** and **AWS**, combined with experience in **microservices architecture** and **CI/CD automation**, allows me to contribute seamlessly to cross-functional teams. Furthermore, I have successfully integrated AI/ML capabilities into enterprise platforms, employing tools like **PostHog** and **Sentry** for performance tracking and error monitoring. With a commitment to compliance standards, I ensure the applications I develop are both robust and secure.
